name: Super Retro
description:
With massive understeer & a tint of oversteer mixed in with bright colors and vivid lines, we present to you Super Retro.

22 Races & 11 Cars to race with either Amazon Voice Remote or Amazon Fire Controller.
Set to the beat of 80's retro beeps the game is all unlocked and ready for racing.


Designed to be picked up and played at moments notice you can get on any track with any car in a very short time frame, just remember to stack your coins next to the TV for who want to race next!

Main Game Features:

22 Race Tracks
3 Race Modes: Time Trial, Sprint & Race
11 Cars
Stereo Sound (where available)
